name: axis
content:
axis noun [C]
(IMAGINARY LINE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a real or imaginary straight line going through the centre of an object that is spinning, or a line that divides a symmetrical shape into two equal halves: The earth revolves around the axis that joins the North and South Poles. The diameter of a circle is also an axis.
a fixed line on a graph used to show the position of a point: Plot distance on the vertical y-axis against time on the horizontal x-axis.
